WorkItem.Description:
This was posted in a discussion but I thought an issue was in order :-
Â 
In the options pane in the DPS  Warrior module, if any of the Hide Spell, Defensive or PvP gear options is checked, the Darkmoon Cards get filtered out of the comparison panes.  Not sure why this would be happening - seems very strange :)

Comments.Message:
Found the problem, it's the fact that it's got 2 special effects on it, one to trigger from damage and one to trigger from Healing. The healing trigger is what's killing it.

We're gonna discuss this as a dev team on how best to handle the situation, because really it should be one special effect with 2 triggers (and we don't have code for that).
